tool_description: Sets up and configures load balancers for distributing traffic across multiple server instances with health checks and SSL termination.

lb_type.description: Load balancer type: application, network, classic

target_instances.description: List of instance IDs or IP addresses to balance

protocol.description: Traffic protocol: HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, UDP

algorithm.description: Load balancing algorithm: round-robin, least-connections, ip-hash

error_messages: Invalid load balancer type: Use one of [application, network, classic].
Empty target instances: Provide at least one target instance ID or IP address.
Port out of range: Ports must be between 1 and 65535.
Invalid protocol: Use one of [HTTP, HTTPS, TCP, UDP].
Invalid algorithm: Use one of [round-robin, least-connections, ip-hash].
Target instance unreachable: One or more target instances are not responding to health checks.
usage: Specify load balancer configuration, target instances, and traffic routing rules. The tool creates and configures the load balancer with health monitoring.

lb_id.description: Unique identifier for the load balancer

lb_dns_name.description: DNS name for accessing the load balancer

lb_ip_address.description: IP address of the load balancer

health_check_status.description: Overall health status of target instances
